item.title: Debci - Continuous Integration for Debian packages
item.dc:creator: uummaaiirr
item.description:
Are there more list like:
cloudways. com/blog/continuous-deployment-tools/

I got bumped into this one and it got some productive read like TeamCity, CI/CD Server (developed by JetBrains) that works with all known testing frameworks and code QA tools, supports VE (Virtual Environments), and runs on all Operating Systems.

Just gonna saved some more to initiate my channel, thanks!

Read full topic
